# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="d24bb-102">Ziņojumu saglabāšana pakalpojumā Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d24bb-103">Programmā Outlook.com nevar saglabāt e-pasta ziņojumus, taču tos varat izdrukāt PDF formātā, ko varat saglabāt savā datorā.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d24bb-104">Operētājsistēmā Windows 10 iekļautā Microsoft Print to PDF utilītprogramma sniedz iespēju izdrukāt jebkuru e-pasta ziņojumu tieši PDF formātā.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-105">Atlasiet ziņojumu, kuru vēlaties saglabāt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-106">Atlasiet trīs punktus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-107">ziņojuma augšdaļā un pēc tam atlasiet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-108">**Drukāt**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-109">Vēlreiz atlasiet **Drukāt** un nolaižamajā izvēlnē printeris atlasiet **Microsoft Print to PDF formātā**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-110">Atlasiet **Drukāt**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="d24bb-111">Ievadiet faila nosaukumu un pēc tam atlasiet **Saglabāt**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d24bb-112">**Piezīme:** To nav ieteicams koplietotajos vai publiskajos datoros, jo citi lietotāji var piekļūt visiem PDF failiem, ko saglabājat datorā, un nedzēst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d24bb-113">Papildinformāciju par drukāšanu skatiet rakstā [e-pasta ziņojumu, pielikumu un kalendāru drukāšana programmā Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d24bb-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
